subject: Frauds and Swindling
Football
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: A man convicted in a multimillion dollar investment fraud case whose victims included N.F.L. players has committed suicide in jail in Atlanta. The man, Kirk Wright, 37, hanged himself Saturday in the Union City jail, Betty Honey, an investigator with the Fulton County Medical Examiner’s office, said Sunday.
